raw: * Static class that provides localized date information (like names of week
* days, AM/PM markers, start of week, etc.).
* @cldr()

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Static class that provides localized date information (like names of week days, AM/PM markers, start of week, etc.).

raw: * Return localized names of day names
* @param length {String} format of the day names.
*       Possible values: "abbreviated", "narrow", "wide"
* @param locale {String} optional locale to be used
* @param context {String} (default: "format") intended context.
*       Possible values: "format", "stand-alone"
* @param withFallback {Boolean?} if true, the previous parameter's other value is tried
* in order to find a localized name for the day
* @return {String[]} array of localized day names starting with sunday.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
length {String} format of the day names.
       Possible values: "abbreviated", "narrow", "wide"
@param.description:
format of the day names.
       Possible values: "abbreviated", "narrow", "wide"

@param.name: @param
@param.body: locale {String} optional locale to be used

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
context {String} (default: "format") intended context.
       Possible values: "format", "stand-alone"

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
withFallback {Boolean?} if true, the previous parameter's other value is tried
 in order to find a localized name for the day
@param.description:
if true, the previous parameter's other value is tried
 in order to find a localized name for the day

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String[]} array of localized day names starting with sunday.
@return.description: array of localized day names starting with sunday.

raw: * Return localized date format string to be used with {@link qx.util.format.DateFormat}.
* @param size {String} format of the date format.
*      Possible values: "short", "medium", "long", "full"
* @param locale {String?} optional locale to be used
* @return {String} localized date format string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return localized date format string to be used with {@link qx.util.format.DateFormat}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
size {String} format of the date format.
      Possible values: "short", "medium", "long", "full"
@param.description:
format of the date format.
      Possible values: "short", "medium", "long", "full"

@param.name: @param
@param.body: locale {String?} optional locale to be used

raw: * Try to localize a date/time format string. For format string possibilities see
* Date/Time Symbol reference
* at CLDR - Unicode Common Locale Data Repository.
* If no localization is available take the fallback format string.
* @param canonical {String} format string containing only field information, and in a canonical order.
*       Examples are "yyyyMMMM" for year + full month, or "MMMd" for abbreviated month + day.
* @param fallback {String} fallback format string if no localized version is found
* @param locale {String} optional locale to be used
* @return {String} best matching format string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Try to localize a date/time format string. For format string possibilities see Date/Time Symbol reference at CLDR - Unicode Common Locale Data Repository. If no localization is available take the fallback format string.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
canonical {String} format string containing only field information, and in a canonical order.
       Examples are "yyyyMMMM" for year + full month, or "MMMd" for abbreviated month + day.
@param.description:
format string containing only field information, and in a canonical order.
       Examples are "yyyyMMMM" for year + full month, or "MMMd" for abbreviated month + day.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: fallback {String} fallback format string if no localized version is found
@param.description: fallback format string if no localized version is found

@param.name: @param
@param.body: locale {String} optional locale to be used

raw: * Provide localization (CLDR) data with fallback between "format" and "stand-alone" contexts.
* It is used in {@link #getDayName} and {@link #getMonthName} methods.
* @param context {String} intended context.
*       Possible values: "format", "stand-alone".
* @param fallbackContext {String} the context used in case no localization is found for the key.
* @param key {String} message id (may contain format strings)
* @param locale {String} the locale
* @return {String} localized name for the key

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Provide localization (CLDR) data with fallback between "format" and "stand-alone" contexts. It is used in {@link #getDayName} and {@link #getMonthName} methods.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
context {String} intended context.
       Possible values: "format", "stand-alone".

@param.name: @param
@param.body: fallbackContext {String} the context used in case no localization is found for the key.
@param.description: the context used in case no localization is found for the key.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: locale {String} the locale
